title: AIOU Fall semester admissions to begin from July 1
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):In line with its mission to bring the light of education to every home, Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) has announced the commencement of admissions for the Autumn Semester 2025, starting July 1, 2025.
The admissions will cover all academic programs, including:Matric (Secondary School)FA, I.Com (Intermediate),Associate Degrees (BA, B.Com, BBA), Associate Degree in Education,B.Ed, BS,Master’s, MS, M.Phil, PhD,Diploma and Certificate Courses, said a pressreleaseon Thursday.
To ensure easy access, detailed program information, prospectuses and admission forms will be available online at AIOU’s official website: www.aiou.edu.pk starting from July 1.
As per the directions of Vice Chancellor Prof. Dr. Nasir Mahmood, all regional campuses across Pakistan will provide free internet and computer facilities at their students’ facilitation centers. Trained staff will be present to guide and assist students in completing the online admission process smoothly.
In a special message to aspiring students, Dr. Nasir Mahmood said that AIOU dreams of delivering education to every individual – no matter their age, location or background. We are committed to removing barriers so every student can learn, grow, and step confidently toward a brighter future.
For guidance and support, students can visit their nearest AIOU regional campus or contact the AIOU helpline at 051-111-112-468.
